meanings.definition: People who specialize in creating marcelling hairstyles.
meanings.sent1: The marcellers at the salon are experts in creating beautiful marcel waves.
meanings.sent2: I went to the marcellers to get a stunning marcel hairstyle for the party.
meanings.sent3: The marcellers joked that they could create a marcel wave even in a hurricane!
meanings.sent4: Her hair, styled by the marcellers, flowed like a river of marcel waves.
meanings.sent5: The marcellers' artistry in marcelling left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: To style hair in a marcel wave pattern.
meanings.sent1: She marcellers her hair every morning to achieve the classic marcel wave look.
meanings.sent2: I learned how to marcellers my hair by watching online tutorials.
meanings.sent3: He decided to marcellers his hair for the costume party, looking like a 1920s star.
meanings.sent4: Her hair marcellers beautifully, creating elegant waves that framed her face.
meanings.sent5: The hairstylist expertly marcellers her hair, transforming it into a work of art.
